attributes.additional_details:
The Royal Charter states:

The Royal Charter is the constitutional basis for the BBC. It sets out the public purposes of the BBC, guarantees its independence, and outlines the duties of the Trust and the Executive Board. 

The treatment of Diana Princess of Wales surely has to be the final straw and the Govt should now be removing all funding and insist on have the charter removed.
attributes.background: Convince the Crown that the BBC should have its Royal Charter removed and the Govt to defund.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about the running of the BBC, however it's not clear what you mean by 'defund', nor what alternative form of funding you want the BBC to receive, if any.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586818
